subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Murray defeated James Blake, 7-5, 6-4, to win the Aegon Championships. The title was Murray’s first on grass, and he became the first British player to win since 1938.
snippet: Top-seeded Andy Murray defeated James Blake, 7-5, 6-4, to win the Aegon Championships. The title was Murray’s first on grass, and he became the first British player to win since 1938.
